descriptions:
['DescriptionLuxuryProperty.com is delighted to present this immaculate B type 6 bedroom family home for sale in Al Barari. 
• 6 Ensuite Bedrooms
• Huge High Ceiling Windows
• Dark Wooden Floors with Walk-in Closet
• Double-height Reception Area
• Uniquely-shaped Pool with a Jacuzzi
• Tree-lined the Front Garden
The villa features a traditional stone exterior and clean modern interiors. A columned foyer flows out to a large living room with sliding glass doors that provide backyard access. This level also contains a family and living room plus a formal dining room. A kitchen with stainless steel appliances and white modern cabinetry and an en-suite guest bedroom with plunge pool complete the floor.
The remaining bedrooms are upstairs, featuring marble-finished en-suites, and covered terraces. A stylish private room can be found in the basement. Maid’s room included.
A stone and wood-floored deck stretch across the rear, framing a uniquely-shaped pool and sunken seating entertainment area. 
This is an ideal family home for the discerning buyer.']

descriptions:
['DescriptionWe are proud to offer to the market the best value A1 property in Victory Heights community. Located in a secluded cul de sac in Novelia village this lovely six bed property boasts lovely views of the golf course
The ground floor has a substantial formal lounge and dining room. There is also a family room as well as an ensuite guest bedroom and power room. The dining kitchen, situated to the rear of the property has been fitted with crisp white cabinetry and includes a large centre island. There is a separate laundry and ensuite maids room. Additionally a driveru2019s room is accessible from the triple garage.
On the first floor, there is a good sized master bedroom with ensuite facilities There are a further 4 bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms. 
The garden sits on a 16,000 sq. ft. plot and had lovely open views of Els golf course. It has been landscaped with lawn to the rear and a variety of shrubbery and trees around the perimeter.
The property is currently vacant
Permit No.1269265100']

descriptions:
['DescriptionThe Noble House Real Estate is proud to present another amazing state of the art villa ideally located in the most sought after community the Emirates Hills.The property is set in a spectacular golf course overlooking the lake and Dubai Skyline. Comprising 7 splendid ensuite bedroom with 7 bathrooms offering a Built Up Area of 26,000 sq.ft. and a spacious Plot Size of 34,049 sq. ft.
The villa is one of a kind combining charm, sophistication, modernity and style. It features a lift inside the house, has a gorgeous infinity swimming pool, sunken fire pit, two (2) modern kitchens with oak wood finish, large basement that can accommodate several cars and has beautifully designed massive outdoor spaces best for entertainment, family events and parties.
Come home to this incredible villa in Emirates Hills and be one among the elite and experience luxury, comfort and privacy
Emirates Hills is the flagship community of Emirates Living, the most sought-after community in Dubai where high net worth individuals live – consisting of exclusive custom-built properties offering amazing views.
To arrange viewings pls call The Noble House Real Estate at +97144566135 or for more details and images of the property, visit our website at www.tnh.ae.']
